/.title: Home
/.description: Luca is a double-entry accounting application to help you organize the transaction activities and cashflow

/account.title: Accounts
/account.description: A table of entries of the accounts within the selected treasury book

/account/add.title: Add Account
/account/add.description: Add a new account to the selected treasury book

/account/[id].title: Account Details
/account/[id].description: The detail information of the account

/account/[id]/edit.title: Edit Account Details
/account/[id]/edit.description: Modify the detail information of the account

/category.title: Categories
/category.description: A table of categories within the selected treasury book

/category/add.title: Add Category
/category/add.description: Add a new category to the selected treasury book

/category/[id].title: Category Details
/category/[id].description: The detail information of the category

/category/[id]/edit.title: Edit Category Details
/category/[id]/edit.description: Modify the detail information of the category

/entry.title: Entries
/entry.description: A table of entries of the transactions within the selected treasury book

/report/change.title: Changes
/report/change.description: A summary of the changes of the transactions and entries within the selected treasury book

/report/balance.title: Balance
/report/balance.description: A summary of the balance of the transactions and entries within the selected treasury book

/tag.title: Tags
/tag.description: A table of tags within the selected treasury book

/tag/add.title: Add Tag
/tag/add.description: Add a new tag to the selected treasury book

/tag/[id].title: Tag Details
/tag/[id].description: The detail information of the tag

/tag/[id]/edit.title: Edit Tag Details
/tag/[id]/edit.description: Modify the detail information of the tag

/transaction.title: Transactions
/transaction.description: A table of transactions within the selected treasury book

/transaction/add.title: Add Transaction
/transaction/add.description: Add a new transaction to the selected treasury book

/transaction/[id].title: Transaction Details
/transaction/[id].description: The detail information of the transaction

/transaction/[id]/edit.title: Edit Transaction Details
/transaction/[id]/edit.description: Modify the detail information of the transaction

/treasury-book.title: Treasury Book
/treasury-book.description: A table of all the treasury books

/treasury-book/add.title: Add Treasury Book
/treasury-book/add.description: Add a new treasury book to your account

/treasury-book/[id].title: Treasury Book Details
/treasury-book/[id].description: The detail information of the treasury book

/treasury-book/[id]/edit.title: Edit Treasury Book Details
/treasury-book/[id]/edit.description: Modify the detail information of the treasury book

/exchange.title: Exchanges
/exchange.description: A table of all the exchanges

/exchange/add.title: Add Exchange
/exchange/add.description: Add a exchange between different treasury books

/exchange/[id].title: Exchange Details
/exchange/[id].description: The detail information of the exchange

/exchange/[id]/edit.title: Edit Exchange Details
/exchange/[id]/edit.description: Modify the detail information of the exchange
